name: FNF - Vs. Starlight Mayhem Full Week
name_original: FNF - Vs. Starlight Mayhem Full Week
description:
Meet CJ

one day you decide to take your girlfriend to a local music festival to listen to some funky tunes, but what's this?! The current lead singer recognizes you from the crowd! Here comes CJ, a cute light headed band boy who has heard of your many music ventures, so he challenges you to a battle! will you be able to overcome the mayhem on this starry night?

This mod adds:

- 3 New funky songs!
- a whole new week featuring stylish cutscenes!
- Fully charted Easy, Normal, and Hard mode!
- fully built in the new Mic'd up engine
- And much more stuff!

But, CJ might not be the only lead you have to worry about..
